ygData.subject: Re: Kill Stealing
ygData.msgSnippet: Patrick Myers wrote: From: Patrick Myers
ygData.messageBody:
<!doctype html public "-//w3c//dtd html 4.0 transitional//en">
<html>
Patrick Myers wrote:
<blockquote TYPE=CITE>From: "Patrick Myers" <chrisstauf@...>
<p>I remember about a week ago, someone mentioned using the spell cancel
magic
<br>to prevent kill stealing. Does anybody know more about this, or have
had any
<br>exp with this.  The trade window trick someone gave me seems to
work ok, but
<br>I would love more tactics.
<br> </blockquote>
<br>
Works better  With pillage or nullify .. but basic when ever they
come in sight .. you dispel them ..  dispelling sow while there Pulling
past you .. while there barely alive and the only thing holding them together
are buffs..
<p>I personally used this IN CT  when We were camping the tae and
This mid 20's group with one higher level Who Couldn't stand up to the
Throne room  keep pulling the tae out past us after doing nothing
but Sitting hidden/invs outa eh way for it  , were were clearing it
and consatly fighting ..  so They pull take to much . There higher
level wizard 34+ at least  would nuke tae they'd Loot and Zone, 
Got all my group member killed at one time or another ..  so Every
time one of them Walk into the room ,  Dispelled nuked .. that was
after they tried to pull the tae from us again ..and we  hit him with
pillage ,( wipes all Enchantments or spells off person....  the puller
went down in about 10 seconds
<p>we had given them tells before and all that Blah blah ..  they
Told us to basically  Mind our own .. and they could pull what they
wanted ..when they wanted ... hmm ok .. pull all ya want ..
<p>Dispelling RES Magic and Sow off a Puller is Not a Nice thing to do
... but when they deserve it ..  ( BTW we used  Golem wands from
the Steel to make sure we did a good job)
<br>--
<p>Jamie Macdonald
<p>A.K.A
<br>Magis DarkStone
<br>Mercenary Mage
<br>Erollisi Marr
<p>-----------------------------------------------------------
<p>"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."
<p>"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"
<p>"Two are 10 times more powerful than One"
<br>-----------------------------------------------------------
<br> </html>
